summary: Build ANC Marketplace: a multi-vendor marketplace platform (Amazon/Shopify/Etsy/eBay-like) with customer/business/seller dashboards, admin control, product & services selling, dropshipping integrations, platform-wide AI assistant for store building/marketing, strict identity/business verification, monetization via per-sale fee (owner exempt), plus an app center and marketing funnel integrations.
architectural_notes: Project name: "ANC Marketplace"; copyright: ANC Electronics N More
Identity verification must be live camera capture (no photo uploads) with ID + selfie match before purchase completion
Business verification includes EIN, registration, and authorized signer identity verification
known_issues: Build/deploy automation failing with messages like "AI couldn't implement your request"; scope may need to be broken into smaller deliverables

existing_features.title: Create an App Center feature that lets merchants and businesses connect and manage integrations (apps) for seller use, including listing existing connected apps and adding/updating/removing app records.

In the App Center, add a workflow to connect a webhook URL that is an affiliate link and automatically create an app entry derived from what the link connects to (using best-effort URL parsing and metadata inference without requiring external APIs).

Create a Funnel Partner page where the owner/admin can configure a funnel partner connection, and merchants/sellers/business users can access the configured partner link to market and advertise their business, products, and services using marketing funnels.

Add a site-wide promotional banner across the very top of the app (above the existing sticky header navigation) that displays the exact message: "We have a startup assistance program called ANC Apprentice Program Center if your interested set an appointment today at : https://calendly.com/anc-electronics-n-services". The banner must include a clickable link to https://calendly.com/anc-electronics-n-services (open in a new tab).

Add a button directly below the banner advertisement (as part of the same top-of-page banner area) labeled exactly: "Connect with the appointment dashboard53". When clicked, it must navigate the user to a new in-app page/route for the appointment dashboard ("Appointment Dashboard53").

Create the "Appointment Dashboard53" page/route and render an embedded view of the Calendly scheduling page https://calendly.com/anc-electronics-n-services (e.g., via an iframe) along with a clear external-link fallback that opens the same URL in a new tab.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create ANC Marketplace core: multi-vendor marketplace with customer, business, and seller dashboards
Admin section with total control, including Products and Services sections (sellers choose products vs services)
Integrate dropshipping providers so sellers can connect providers and list/post their items
Platform-wide AI assistant to help users build stores/sites and market/advertise products/services
Onboarding & verification: free signup; business verification required for businesses; all sellers/merchants must verify identity
Customer identity verification required to complete purchases: live capture with camera (ID + selfie match), explain verification rationale; payment can be initiated but not completed until verified
Business verification details: verify EIN, registration, and authorized signer identity
Monetization: $5 service fee per sale paid to owner; marketplace owner exempt and is the only one allowed to sell without the fee
App Center for merchants/businesses to connect and deploy apps for seller use
App Center feature: convert connected webhook affiliate links into apps based on link destination
Marketing funnel page: connect a funnel partner so sellers/businesses can use funnels to market/advertise products and services
Site-wide banner promoting ANC Apprentice Program Center with Calendly link and appointment dashboard button
Implement backend support for a per-sale service fee where the marketplace owner is exempt from being charged the fee, and ensure the owner is the only seller that can sell without incurring the fee.
